_header: Maiden mother mild / oeiz cel oreysoun
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — six monorhyming stanzas with medial rhyme, in English and French

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Mayden moder milde oieȝ cel oreysounfrom shome þou
                    me shilde e de ly malfeloun…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…he was ycrouned kynge pur nostre redempciounWhose wol
                    me synge auera graunt pardoun
